title: Prepare for Clinical Trial Database Lock
description: A data manager is preparing for the final database lock of a completed clinical trial.

tasks.description: Run a final report of all open data queries in the EDC system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a report showing 5 remaining open queries.

tasks.description: Work with the clinical monitoring team to ensure all open queries are resolved and closed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows up with CRAs until all queries are closed.

tasks.description: Perform the final data reconciliation between the clinical and safety databases.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a reconciliation and confirms there are no discrepancies in adverse event reporting.

tasks.description: Execute the database lock procedure in the EDC system, making the data read-only.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locks the database and generates an audit trail of the action.
